title: Sundance Jammers
description: Bruce and Barb Fox are once again hosting The Sundance Jammers, musicians who spend their winters in Casa Grande, Arizona, following their performance at the Three Mile Community Park in 2023. Admission is free and donations are much appreciated. Bring your lawn chairs, refreshments, and shade! Bring the family and invite your friends for an evening of country music, gospel, and rock and roll oldies’ greatest hits. Contact Bruce Fox if you have any questions.

eventLink.text: Location: Ambrose Park on Sunnyside Cemetary Rd.

title: Parents Night Out
description: Drop your kids off at the church and enjoy a date night! There will be a supervised time of games and snacks for children 2-12. RSVP Required, please see Julie or contact the church office.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center Ministry
description: Our church will hold a worship service for the residents of BVLC. All are welcome to join us in this ministry.

title: Communion Sunday
description: We will celebrate the Lord's Supper this Sunday.

title: Celebrate Life Montana
description: Join in a celebration of the Dobbs decision that overturned Roe vs. Wade. There will be speakers, games, food, raffles and more family fun. We'll see you at The River Church, 354 Cooper Lane, Hamilton.

title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring non-perishable food items to donate to the local food bank. Items can be placed in the donation box in the foyer.

title: Celebration of Life for Neil McKee
description: There will be a Celebration of Life for Neil McKee at the McKee’s home, 674 Porter Hill Rd, Stevi. Everything from chairs to food will be provided. Jim Carlson will be officiating.

title: Women's Luncheon
description: All ladies are invited to join a once a month get-together throughout the summer. Bring your own sack lunch and a lawn chair.

eventLink.text: Location: Lewis and Clark Park in Stevi (on 2nd St.)

title: Women's Luncheon
description: All ladies are invited to join a once a month get-together throughout the summer. Bring your own sack lunch - CHANGE: This month we will meet at the church due to the weather.

title: Women's Luncheon
description: All ladies are invited to join a once a month get-together throughout the summer. Bring your own sack lunch and a lawn chair.

eventLink.text: Location: Ambrose Park on Sunnyside Cemetary Rd.

title: Ladies Bible Study
description: The new study book is "First Corinthians, Living Love When We Disagree" by Melissa Spoelstra.   The cost of the book is $10.00.  To sign up contact Louisa Richardson.

title: Grief Share
description: Meeting Saturdays at Florence-Carlton church. Group discussion will follow each free session. Each session includes a short video featuring interviews with grief recovery experts and real-life stories of people who have experienced the death of a loved one. Contact the church office for more information.
